mapper.select: SELECT e.*, pi.*, p.* FROM event_product ep INNER JOIN product p on p.id = ep.product_id INNER JOIN event e on e.id = ep.event_id INNER JOIN product_info pi on pi.product_code = p.product_info_id WHERE e.name = #{name}

SELECT ep.id,e.name, pi.imgname as product_imgname, pi.name as product_name, p.qnt, p.price,p.id as product_id, e.imgname as event_imgname, e.start_date, e.end_date FROM event_product ep INNER JOIN product p on p.id = ep.product_id INNER JOIN event e on e.id = ep.event_id INNER JOIN product_info pi on pi.product_code = p.product_info_id WHERE e.start_date = #{start_date}
